idea:
Founder of Idea Enrich--Idea Enrich is a Business Design and Consulting Firm that believes in combining cognitive curiosity with human centered approach to build innovative business models.

A creative and successful entrepreneur with more than 10 years of experience in the industry in designing modular furniture for premium homes in Mumbai.

Studied Innovation and Research from Marladalen University, Sweden and Business Design from Welingkar Institute of Management and Research.

Worked with Amul on launching probiotic yoghurt line.

Finalist at the prestigious L.I.M.E (Learning in Marketing Excellence) Challenge- Season 3 by Hindustan Unilever on CNBC 18.
name: Richa Gupta

idea: Cubic Container Systems LLP manufactures Stainless Steel Beer Kegs in capacities of 5 Liters, 20 Liters, 30 Liters, 50 Liters. Our manufacturing facility is located in Ambernath, Maharashtra. We have been manufacturing kegs since 2018 and supplying to all microbreweries.
name: CUBIC CONTAINER SYSTEMS LLP

idea:
1. To cultivate, grow, produce, harvest raise or deal in agriculture produce as agriculturists, farmers or gardeners and to set up processing unit for import, export, distribute or deal in agriculture produce of all description, like fruits, vegetable, seeds and herbal products and trade in all the products required for cultivation, harvesting, production and developments of seeds, vegetable, fruits and herbal items.
2. To cultivate, grow, produce or deal in agriculture produce and to carry on the business of agriculturists, farmers, gardeners, dairymen, dairy farmers, and to acquire, hold, buy or acquire freehold or leasehold agriculture land, farm, garden or any other, property and to act as growers of corn, hay, straw, seeds or animal feed and to deal in live-stock and deal in such business as may be required by farmers and dealers of agriculture produce.
3. To carry on the business of planters, growers and cultivators of seeds, vegetable, fruits and herbs and to cultivate, grow, produce or deal in vegetable, fruits and herbs and to undertake the activities for its processing, preservation or storage with the installation for plant, machinery, cold storage, air conditioning, refrigeration and other equipment and to provide consulting and support services
4. Technology Enabling Agriculture yield and assisting in sales and distribution.
name: SHIVAANG NATUROTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Diamond Demand is a Private Limited Company incorporated under the company's act of 2013.


In India, Gems and Jewellery business is vast and its growing rapidly every year so turnover of the business varies, does not remain constant.


In this trade, most of the people belong to MSME sector. Due to which, Small Exporters, Traders & Jewellers are facing difficulties in sourcing diamonds.


Hence, for the easy supply, we have created this platform named 'Diamond Demand' for the supply of diamonds and gem stones.


It has its own web portal, mobile app and mobile messaging service(Whatsapp). Buyers and Sellers post their demands via WhatsApp, Mobile App or Portal.


Our, Very own platform is also registered under Trademark & Copyrights.

This platform has various other amazing features and is user friendly. This business has a high scope since its an unique platform and a useful one for MSME Diamond sectors.


Having a high potential of creating Wealth & Employment.

Diamond Demand Family is growing day by day as its a start-up on its own.

Promotors and Directors ;


1) Name : Munit K. Shah

Age : 32

Designation : Director

Qualification : GIA GRADUATE

Continuing Business Legacy from 3 generations who can more creatively

craft the design and module to prosper and offer more services to Diamond Gems & Jewelry industry.


2) Name : Vatsal H. Bhansali

Age : 29

Designation : Director

Qualification : LLB

Four Father's into Diamond Vatsal H. Bhansali how ever selected an is the admin side of Diamond Demand.
name: DIAMOND DEMAND
